title: The Bristol's Winter Caipirinha Recipe
full_text:
The Bristol's Winter Caipirinha Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
7 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3
lime
wedges
4
kumquats
, cut in half
10
rosemary
needles
Scant
1
tablespoon
sugar
2
ounces
cachaça
Ice
Garnish:
rosemary sprig
and additional
sliced kumquats
Directions
In a mixing glass, muddle lime wedges, kumquats, rosemary needles, and sugar. Add cachaça and fill with ice. Shake well. Pour ingredients unstrained into a rocks glass. Garnish with rosemary sprig and additional sliced kumquats.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass, muddler
Cocktails
Winter Drinks
